alert.note: Alert for South Central Oregon Desert including the BLM Land in Eastern Lake and Western Harney Counties (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Medford (Southwest Oregon and Northern California)
info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued August 10 at 1:24PM PDT until August 10 at 9:00PM PDT by NWS Medford
info.description: .Strong winds aloft will gradually mix downward to all elevations this afternoon and evening, and are likely to do so again Thursday. Gusty south to southwest winds combined with low RH and recent fire starts will lead to critical fire weather conditions Wednesday afternoon and evening and Thursday afternoon and evening in south central Oregon and northeast California. ...RED FLAG WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 PM PDT THIS EVENING FOR STRONG GUSTY WIND WITH LOW RH FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONE 625... * Impacts: Strong, gusty wind with low relative humidity and critically dry vegetation will greatly increase the spread potential of any new and existing fires. * Affected area: In South Central OR...Portions of south and northeast Fire Weather Zone 625, including Christmas Valley, ALkali Lake, Adel, and portions of the Hart Mountain Antelope Refuge. * Wind: Southwest 15 to 25 mph with gusts up to 35 mph. * Humidity: As low as 8 percent. * View the hazard area in detail at: https://www.wrh.noaa.gov/mfr/HAZARD

area.areaDesc: South Central Oregon Desert including the BLM Land in Eastern Lake and Western Harney Counties
